Info.Title: Kung Fu Hustle
Info.Writer: Stephen Chow, Kan-Cheung Tsang, Xin Huo, Man Keung Chan
Info.Actors: Stephen Chow, Xiaogang Feng, Wah Yuen, Zhihua Dong
Info.Plot: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 24 wins & 46 nominations.
